mapper.select: select m.perms from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT su.user_id as id,su.username as name FROM sys_user su JOIN sys_user_role sur JOIN sys_role sr WHERE sur.user_id = su.user_id and sr.role_id = sur.role_id and sr.role_id='2' and su.user_id !='1'
